div.head: 金刃箭傷
div.div: injury inflicted by metal [objects such as] blade and arrow

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: injury inflicted by metal [objects such as] blade and arrow

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with dao jian shang 刀箭傷 , harm inflicted by blade and arrow. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry san qi 三七：金刃箭傷、跌扑杖瘡，血出不止者，嚼爛塗，或 為末摻之，其血即止 , “For injury inflicted by metal [objects, such as] blade and arrow , as well as wounds from falls and being hit with a rod, with unending bleeding, chew to a pulp and apply externally, or prepare a powder to be inserted into the wound, and the bleeding will end immediately”.
